src:
Brendan Rodgers Latih MU? Yang Benar Saja!
01 Nov 2019, 17:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Legenda Liverpool, Jamie Carragher menepis rumor bahwa Brendan Rodgers akan melatih Manchester United. Carragher percaya bahwa bos Leicester City itu tidak akan menangani Setan Merah sampai kapanpun.
Sejak awal tahun kemarin, Rodgers sudah kembali ke Inggris. Ia dipercaya menangani Leicester City setelah ia memetik banyak kesuksesan bersama klub Skotlandia, Glasgow Celtic.
Musim ini Rodgers membuat The Foxes tampil meyakinkan di mana mereka kini berada di peringkat 3 klasemen sementara EPL. Alhasil beredar rumor bahwa Manchester United akan menjadikannya pengganti Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.
Namun Carragher meyakini bahwa Rodgers tidak akan menangani United. "Saya rasa itu [Rodgers melatih MU] tidak akan pernah terjadi," ujar Carragher kepada The Express.

Baca komentar lengkap bek legendaris Liverpool itu di bawah ini.
text:
Brendan Rodgers Trains MU? Seriously!
Nov 1 2019, 17:00 by Bola.net
Liverpool - Liverpool legend Jamie Carragher has dismissed rumors that Brendan Rodgers will coach Manchester United. Carragher believes that the Leicester City boss will not handle the Red Devils forever.
Since the beginning of last year, Rodgers has returned to England. He is believed to handle Leicester City after he reaped much success with the Scottish club, Glasgow Celtic.
This season Rodgers made the Foxes look convincing where they are now ranked 3 in the EPL standings. As a result rumors circulated that Manchester United will make it a substitute for Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.
But Carragher believes that Rodgers will not handle United. "I don't think that [Rodgers coached MU] will ever happen," Carragher told The Express.

Read the full comments of the legendary Liverpool defender below.
